t_video_day_in_the_life::text_card_0::te: A day in the life follows one character throughout the story. The story may follow a literal day, or simply showcase an important part of the day. This template assumes you are following a character with a specific type of work, but the clips can be used to document anyone's day or activity. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_7::go: Erekana ico wa muntu wawe akora mukwiryohera.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_9::go: Baza ikibazo :murashobora munkundiye kutubwira kazoza kawe ?
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_3::go: Erekana wa muntu wawe ariko aritegura kugira atangure umunsi.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_1::go: Twereke ikintu c’ibonekeza kubijanye naho aba wa muntu wawe.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_10::g: Erekana wa muntu wawe mu mpera z’umunsi.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_4::go: Twereke ico uyo muntu akora kugira abeho.
t_video_day_in_the_life::title: Day in the Life Video
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_6::go: Twereke ikintu gihambaye kubijanye n’akazi k’uwo muntu.
t_video_day_in_the_life::clip_card_8::go: Erekana aho wa muntu wawe ahereza umunsi.
